frontmatter.title: Message from the Provost to Students: Update on the Fall Semester

node.excerpt: April 28, 2020 Dear Lions: We miss you and we are grateful for your resilience and the many ways you continue to thrive amidst COVID-19 challenges. Your dedication to learning and caring for one another has warmed my heart and made me proud. I know that you and your families are preparing for the fall 2020 semester, and our goal is to return to our campuses next semester, noting the clarifications…

node.excerpt: April 15, 2020 Changes to Summer Sessions I and II: Catch-Up, Make-Up, and Level-Up Due to worldwide distancing measures and travel restrictions to prevent the spread of COVID-19, LMU will conduct its 2020 summer sessions solely online.
